The information provided by OmniaWrite on our application is for general informational purposes only.
All information on our web and mobile application is provided in good faith, however we make no representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, adequacy, validity, reliability, availability or completeness of any information on our application.
Under no circumstance shall we have any liability to you for any loss or damage of any kind incurred as a result of the use of our application or reliance on any information provided on our application.
Your use of the application and your reliance on any information on our application is solely at your own risk.
